name: The Cornucopia of Infinite Adventure- Demo
name_original: The Cornucopia of Infinite Adventure- Demo
description:
This app generates a pen-and-paper gamebook.

Differences Between this Demo and the Intended Product

The paragraphs will be in a random order. It's currently possible to distinguish the main path from side-paths based on the paragraph numbers.

The finished product should include city, dungeon and wilderness adventures, but this demo only includes city adventures.

The finished product will generate a pdf. This demo only prints the text as a html page.

The first and final paragraphs are currently only placeholders.

Other changes will be based on your feedback.
